Package Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPartsController
    This class controller handles adding parts to the parts list and inventory.
    AddProductController
    This class controls the methods and data for the AddProductController Logical Error: Logical errors that occurred came from input validation, ie; min, max, stock.
    MainController
    Main controller that links all pages, and sends information about parts/products Future Enhancement: This controller redundantly uses code to map forms.
    ModifyPartsController
    This class modifies parts that have already been added to the inventory.
    ModifyProductController
    This class is the controller for the modify product screen Runtime Errors: Run time errors were caused when trying to cast data types incorrectly, and null pointer exception when trying to access methods from outside the file To get around these errors instances of Product and the observable list are declared in this file, to more simply access methods without null pointer exceptions or data type inconsistencies
